menuText:
I am Rafal, and currently have been working as a Front End Developer.
Up till now have worked on many different projects, and in each of them I have used and developed my technical skills in different areas including development, web design and web usability, accessibility, web marketing, management and testing skills.

I am an experienced, University-educated Front End Developer whose objective is to build up my already existing technical skills, whilst working in a team environment. I am passionate about development and always keen to work with the latest technologies.
Languages
X/HTML5, CSS2/3 , OO Javascript, jQuery, Backbone, RaphaelJS, PHP, MySQL, C++, Assembler, Action Script 3

debugging in iOS and Windows, and Android environments.

Mobile Platform
Phone Gap/Cordova

Versioning control systems
Git/GitFlow and SVN

Systems
Linux, Windows, DOS, MacOS

Applications
MS Office, Photoshop, Illustrator, Visual Web Developer, Adobe Flash
